# File lib/bit-struct/bit-struct.rb, line 309
  def initialize(value = nil)   # :yields: instance
    self << self.class.initial_value

    case value
    when Hash
      value.each do |k, v|
        send "#{k}=", v
      end
    
    when nil
      
    else
      self[0, value.length] = value
    end
    
    self.class.closed!
    yield self if block_given?
  end
